entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow Grains, -1.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
